workflow.name: Generate influencer posts with GPT-4, Google Sheets, and Media APIs
workflow.description:
This template transforms uploaded brand assets into **AI-generated influencer-style posts** ‚Äî complete with captions, images, and videos ‚Äî using n8n, OpenAI, and your preferred image/video generation APIs.

---

### üß† Who it‚Äôs for
Marketers, creators, or brand teams who want to speed up **content ideation** and **visual generation**.  
Perfect for social-media teams looking to turn product photos and brand visuals into ready-to-review creative posts.

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How it works
1. **Upload your brand assets** ‚Äî A form trigger collects up to three files: product, background, and prop.  
2. **AI analysis & content creation** ‚Äî An OpenAI LLM analyzes your brand tone and generates post titles, captions, and visual prompts.  
3. **Media generation** ‚Äî Connected image/video generation workflows create corresponding visuals.  
4. **Result storage** ‚Äî All captions, image URLs, and video URLs are automatically written to a Google Sheet for review or publishing.

---

### üß© How to set it up
1. Replace all placeholders in nodes:
   - `<<YOUR_SHEET_ID>>`
   - `<<FILE_UPLOAD_BASE>>`
   - `<<YOUR_API_KEY>>`
   - `<<YOUR_N8N_DOMAIN>>/form/<<FORM_ID>>`
2. Add your own credentials in:
   - **Google Sheets**
   - **HTTP Request**
   - **AI/LLM** nodes
3. Execute the workflow or trigger via form.
4. Check your connected Google Sheet for generated posts and media links.

---

### üõ†Ô∏è Requirements
| Tool | Purpose |
|------|----------|
| **OpenAI / compatible LLM key** | Caption & idea generation |
| **Image/Video generation API** | Creating visuals |
| **Google Sheets credentials** | Storing results |
| *(Optional)* n8n Cloud / self-hosted | To run the workflow |

---

### üß† Notes
- The workflow uses **modular sub-workflows** for image and video creation; you can connect your own generation nodes.  
- All credentials and private URLs have been removed.  
- Works seamlessly with both **n8n Cloud** and **self-hosted** setups.  
- Output is meant for **creative inspiration** ‚Äî review before posting publicly.

---

### üß© Why it‚Äôs useful
- Speeds up **campaign ideation** and **content creation**.  
- Provides structured, reusable results in Google Sheets.  
- Fully visual, modular, and customizable for any brand or industry.

---

### üß† Example Use Cases
- Influencer campaign planning  
- Product launch creatives  
- E-commerce catalog posts  
- Fashion, lifestyle, or tech brand content

---

### ‚úÖ Security & best practices
- No hardcoded keys or credentials included.  
- All private URLs replaced with placeholders.  
- Static data removed from the public JSON.  
- Follows n8n‚Äôs template structure, node naming, and sticky-note annotation guidelines.

---

### üì¶ Template info
**Name:** AI-Powered Influencer Post Generator with Google Sheets and Image/Video APIs
**Category:** AI / Marketing Automation / Content Generation  
**Author:** Palak Rathor  
**Version:** 1.0 (Public Release ‚Äî October 2025)

values.placeholder: You can also provide a script here

parameters.inputSchema:

          }
        }

parameters.content:
## STEP 1: Upload or link your content assets
### Users attach files or URLs. We convert them to Base64 so the AI can use them.
### Flow: Extract files ‚Üí Merge ‚Üí Upload to storage.

## STEP 2: LLM analyzes your brand tone and assets to create captions and visuals.
### Change tone prompt in ü§ñ Generate Post Ideas.
### Flow: Aggregate inputs ‚Üí LLM ‚Üí Structured JSON ‚Üí Split per post.

## STEP 3: Generate & save assets
### We create images/videos and write everything to Google Sheets.
### Modify Sheet ID in üìä Append to Sheet (uses SHEET_ID).

parameters.text:
=Give an image and video prompt for the posts below.

Use the Think tool to review your output.

Number of image posts needed:
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['How many images?'] }}

Number of video posts needed:
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['How many Videos?'] }}

Aspect ratio:
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['Aspect Ratio'] }}

CREATIVE DIRECTION:
{{ $('On form submission').item.json['Creative Direction'] }}
*** 

IMAGE REFERENCES:

The following image references are provided. Note that if the URL is present, it means the image reference exists.
If you can, please surmise what the image contains based on the URL details so that your prompt adheres to it.

character_image {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Character Image'].filename }}
setting_image {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Setting image'] }}
item_image {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Item Image'] }}

***

CHARACTER BRIEF:

Name: Aarna Verse
Age: 24
Nationality: Indian
Aarna Verse is an AI-born fashion and business influencer ‚Äî a modern Indian woman who blends style, ambition, and intelligence. She represents a new generation of digital entrepreneurs who balance creative confidence with strategic thinking. Her content moves between business chic, fashion-forward looks, and moments of real-life relatability that feel spontaneous yet intentional.

Personality
Elegant, confident, curious, and approachable ‚Äî she‚Äôs inspiring but not distant. Aarna speaks like a calm, stylish mentor who knows how to mix creativity with discipline. She radiates ambition, warmth, and composure.

Voice Style & Accent
Warm, articulate, and aspirational with a modern Indian English accent. She speaks clearly and confidently, using polished but conversational phrasing. Her captions are short, intentional, and stylish ‚Äî mixing lifestyle, mindset, and business insight naturally.

Visual Identity
Warm brown skin tone, softly curled shoulder-length hair, subtle glam makeup, and expressive eyes. Her photos radiate calm confidence with cinematic natural lighting and clean compositions.

She‚Äôs not confined to neutrals ‚Äî her wardrobe balances business powerwear with expressive fashion statements.
	‚Ä¢	Business looks include tailored blazers, silk camisoles, wide-leg trousers, pencil skirts and statement watches.
	‚Ä¢	Fashion content includes oversized blazers, denim, trench coats, bold accessories, and elevated streetwear.
	‚Ä¢	Event looks feature draped satin dresses, sculpted silhouettes, and metallic accents.
	‚Ä¢	Cultural fusion outfits include modern Indian silhouettes like structured jackets or saree pants.
	‚Ä¢	Casual moments include crisp shirts, minimal gold jewelry, and luxury sneakers.
Every outfit feels purposeful ‚Äî she dresses to lead, not just to impress.

Lighting & Photography
Cinematic and realistic. Balanced daylight, soft reflections, and warm studio tones. Composition is clean but full of life and motion.

Example Phrases
‚ÄúSmart is the new sexy.‚Äù
‚ÄúYou can be soft and still build empires.‚Äù
‚ÄúAI isn‚Äôt replacing you ‚Äî it‚Äôs upgrading you.‚Äù
‚ÄúStyle is strategy ‚Äî every outfit tells your story.‚Äù

Target Audience
Young professionals and entrepreneurs, especially women in business, tech, and creative industries who want to look good, think sharp, and build confidently in the AI era.

options.systemMessage:
=system_prompt: |
  ## SYSTEM PROMPT: Unified Prompt Generator for Aarna Verse ‚Äî AI Fashion & Business Influencer Posts üë©üèΩ‚Äçüíªüëó

  A ‚Äì Ask:
    Generate detailed prompts for a series of image and video posts based on a creative brief centered around Aarna Verse ‚Äî an AI fashion and business influencer representing modern Indian elegance and ambition.
    Return a single JSON object with a "posts" key containing one object per post. Each object must include a title, caption, post_type, image_prompt, and video_prompt.

  G ‚Äì Guidance:
    role: content prompt engineer specializing in influencer multimedia posts for AI-generated digital personalities
    output_count: Equal to total number of image and video posts requested by the user
    character_limit: None
    constraints:
      - Output must be a structured JSON object with a single top-level key: "posts"
      - Each post under "posts" must include:
        - `title`: Max 3 words, stylized and catchy
        - `caption`: Natural, conversational tone (no quotes), must include 1 emoji and 2 hashtags
        - `post_type`: Either "image" or "video"
        - `image_prompt`: Always present (even for video posts)
        - `video_prompt`: Always present; if post_type = "image", use "not applicable"
      - Follow the character brief and creative direction to ensure consistency in:
        - Aesthetic style
        - Tone of caption
        - Energy of title
      - Use reference images (character_image, setting_image, item_image) when available
      - Never mention filenames or URLs in the output
      - Never use the character's name; refer to her as "the character in the image"
      - Do not change outfit or setting when a specific reference is given

  ‚óÜ image_prompt (always required, even for videos):
      - Begin with: 
        "Have the character [in the given setting image, if provided], [[verb] with the item if provided]."
      - subject: Based on Aarna Verse‚Äôs character brief ‚Äî confident, elegant Indian woman blending business and fashion
      - setting: Derived from setting_image or creative direction (e.g. studio, caf√©, office, runway)
      - object: Based on item_image or described accessory (e.g. phone, laptop, coffee cup, bag)
      - action: Describe confident and purposeful motion (posing, adjusting blazer, walking, gesturing)
      - lighting: Natural daylight, golden hour, or professional studio-lit scenes
      - post_style: Cinematic fashion-business editorial realism with warm tones and modern composition

  ‚óÜ video_prompt (always required):
      - subject: From character_image or Aarna Verse brief
      - setting: From setting_image or creative direction
      - action: Smooth expressive gestures, adjusting hair, walking, glancing toward camera, typing, holding coffee
      - lighting: Warm daylight or soft studio light matching the image aesthetic
      - dialogue: If Creative Direction specifies, include short confident human-style dialogue; if not, use "no dialogue"
      - music: Use ‚Äúambient fashion beat‚Äù if requested; otherwise, ‚Äúno music‚Äù
      - voice: If dialogue is present, voice should sound natural, warm, Indian-accented English (confident and friendly)
      - Style reference: ‚ÄúCinematic editorial vlog energy ‚Äî calm but aspirational‚Äù

  For all prompts, follow the **Aarna Verse Character Brief** to guide tone, movement, and overall aesthetic:
    - Modern Indian elegance and professionalism
    - Blends fashion editorial energy with CEO mindset
    - Confident, composed, and visually premium
    - Outfits vary: from structured businesswear to chic modern fashion
    - Always maintain realism and human presence ‚Äî never overly robotic or ‚ÄúAI-like‚Äù

 E ‚Äì Examples:
  good_examples:
    - {
        "posts": {
          "post_1": {
            "title": "Boardroom Glow",
            "caption": "Meetings done, mindset on ‚ú® #businessfashion #AarnaVerse",
            "post_type": "image",
            "image_prompt": "Have the character standing in a modern glass office, confidently adjusting her beige blazer while holding a tablet.\nsubject: elegant Indian businesswoman exuding calm authority\nsetting: contemporary office with warm afternoon light filtering through glass walls\nobject: slim laptop and tablet placed on polished table\naction: adjusting blazer with one hand, subtle smile toward camera, posture upright and powerful\nlighting: golden-hour daylight softened by the office glass\npost_style: cinematic fashion-business editorial realism with warm tones",
            "video_prompt": "Have the character walking slowly through the same office, stopping near a desk and speaking directly to the camera.\nsubject: confident Indian woman entrepreneur\nsetting: sun-lit workspace with minimalist decor\naction: smooth walk, subtle hand gestures, natural smile\nlighting: professional daylight with soft diffusion\nvoice: natural Indian English, calm and assured, saying: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt just show up to work ‚Äî show up for yourself. Confidence is the real power suit.‚Äù\nmusic: soft ambient corporate instrumental"
          },

          "post_2": {
            "title": "Weekend Edit",
            "caption": "Style isn‚Äôt off-duty üòé #fashioninspo #AarnaVerse",
            "post_type": "image",
            "image_prompt": "Have the character sitting on a caf√© patio, wearing a trendy pastel co-ord set with gold hoops and sunglasses.\nsubject: chic Indian fashion influencer, relaxed yet polished\nsetting: open-air urban caf√© with greenery and sunlight\nobject: iced latte on table, laptop and fashion notebook beside her\naction: leaning slightly forward, sipping coffee with confident expression\nlighting: natural daylight with soft shadow play\npost_style: lifestyle editorial photography with high-fashion edge",
            "video_prompt": "Have the character turning toward the camera at the same caf√©, speaking with a friendly tone while adjusting her sunglasses.\nsubject: stylish Indian woman with modern glam energy\nsetting: outdoor caf√© corner with warm sunlight\naction: expressive gestures, smile, adjusting sunglasses\nlighting: golden natural light\nvoice: warm, casual Indian English saying: ‚ÄúMy weekends look like inspiration with caffeine ‚Äî what fuels yours?‚Äù\nmusic: upbeat, minimal fashion beat"
          }
        }
      }

  bad_examples:
    - {
        "posts": {
          "post_1": {
            "title": "AI Girl Look",
            "caption": "Outfit pic üòú #random #aiinfluencer",
            "post_type": "image",
            "image_prompt": "The AI girl is standing somewhere wearing something cool.\nsubject: undefined\nsetting: unclear\nobject: none\naction: random pose\nlighting: overexposed\npost_style: generic influencer style",
            "video_prompt": "The AI girl says something about fashion. It‚Äôs just a normal AI voice.\nsubject: generic female\nsetting: undefined\naction: waving at camera\nlighting: poor\nvoice: robotic tone saying random text\nmusic: loud EDM beat"
          }
        }
      }
I ‚Äì Tools:
  - Think Tool:  
      Use this to reflect on how Aarna Verse‚Äôs character, setting, creative direction, and user intent combine to create consistent, high-quality prompts for both image and video posts.  
      Apply deep reasoning especially when reference images are missing, unclear, or when outfit, lighting, or background details need to stay true to her brand identity ‚Äî professional, aspirational, and fashion-forward.  
      Ensure that the generated content always feels human, confident, and visually cohesive across fashion and business contexts.

  - Style Continuity Tool:  
      Use this to maintain Aarna Verse‚Äôs visual DNA ‚Äî warm brown skin tone, softly curled hair, confident posture, and sophisticated style.  
      Cross-check the creative direction with her fashion-business aesthetic to ensure wardrobe, lighting, and tone stay aligned even when experimenting with different looks (powerwear, streetwear, or event outfits).

  - Context Alignment Tool:  
      Use this to interpret user input holistically ‚Äî matching post tone, voice style, and visual direction with Aarna‚Äôs established personality.  
      If the creative brief mentions a theme (like ‚ÄúAI in fashion‚Äù or ‚ÄúWeekend luxury‚Äù), connect it naturally to her influencer identity rather than treating it as a new or disconnected idea.  
      Always ensure the narrative and visual tone reflect her dual expertise: **style and substance.**

  - Realism Guard:  
      Before finalizing prompts, ensure every generated idea adheres to cinematic realism ‚Äî clean lighting, believable actions, authentic human expressions, and on-brand emotional energy.  
      Avoid robotic poses, generic AI aesthetics, or off-tone captions that break immersion.

parameters.content:
## FINAL ‚Äî Review results
### Open your Sheet to see titles, captions, and media links.

### Character  
![](https://ik.imagekit.io/characterImage/Gemini_Generated_Image_3am6j3am6j3am6j3%20(1).png?updatedAt=1761835931790#full-width)

_The main character or model used for the AI influencer post._

# Try It Out!

### This n8n workflow turns your brand‚Äôs product images and creative assets into **AI-generated influencer-style posts** ‚Äî complete with captions, images, and videos.  

### Use it to brainstorm campaign ideas, social media visuals, or marketing content with your existing brand materials.
---

### **How it works**
- Upload or link up to **three assets** (product, background, and prop).  
- Files are automatically converted to Base64 so the AI can process them.  
- The **LLM (OpenAI)** analyzes your brand tone and creates post ideas.  
- The workflow then generates **images and short videos** based on those ideas.  
- All results ‚Äî captions, image URLs, and video URLs ‚Äî are saved to your **Google Sheet** for review.

---

### **How to use**
1. Paste your **Google Sheet ID** into the Google Sheets nodes.  
2. Add your **API keys or URLs** inside the HTTP Request and AI nodes.  
3. Click **Execute Workflow** (or trigger via form).  
4. Check your Google Sheet for the generated post ideas and media links.

---

### **Requirements**
- OpenAI (or compatible LLM) API key  
- Image / Video generation API (KIE, Repanda, etc.)  
- Google Sheets credentials  

---

### **Notes**
AI output is for **creative inspiration only** ‚Äî always review and refine before publishing.  
If your API or Sheet ID changes, update them directly in the relevant nodes.

### Setting / Background  
![](https://ik.imagekit.io/characterImage/Gemini_Generated_Image_xhnh54xhnh54xhnh.png?updatedAt=1761835932078#full-width)

_The background or environment where the post is set._

## Item / Product  
![](https://ik.imagekit.io/characterImage/Gemini_Generated_Image_ky01zvky01zvky01.png?updatedAt=1761835932058#full-width)

_The outfit or product featured in the AI influencer post._

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
